========

![](vufgb-measuresoflocation-003-en-bargraph01.png)
  
In this situation, how do the mode, median and mean visibility compare?  
  
Answerlist
----------
* Median < mode < mean
* Mode < mean < median
* Mean < mode < median
* Mode < median < mean

Solution
========

* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
